name: Goat Soccer
description:
My submission for GMTK 2021. 

* currently trying to fix an HTML bug where the goat dashes over and over without needing to click left mouse button

My early concept had you head butting waves of enemies that were coming after your child. I was not enjoying that concept and this gave me lots of trouble. In the last 3 hours of the jam (and the only time I had on Sunday) I made it into goat soccer. Enjoy
